component.name: SkyBase Analysis
component.author: Murray lab (C2B2)
component.description: SkyBase is a database that stores the homology models built by SkyLine analysis for PDB structures at 60% redundancy cutoff and all NESG PSI2 protein structures. Users can search the database with their sequence of interest to find homology models which meet user-defined alignment coverage and sequence identity constraints. See also http://skybase.c2b2.columbia.edu/nesg3/help/help.html.
